entry.title: Setting up this blog
entry.content:
Install octopress

  1. Please follow the instructions as documented here.
  2. execute the following commands $ rake setup_github_pages Enter the read/write url for your repository: git@github.com:<your-id>/<git-path>
  3. Also you can find very good documentation here

Checkin the sources

BTW, dont forget to add the sources to a separate branch 'sources' git add . git commit -m 'blog sources' git push origin source

Updating blog

rake generate rake preview
